languages.text: "В столице бои, но мы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}крепко держимся{/d}, бунтарям спуску не даем! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} защищает!" {n}В голосе сержанта звучит бравая уверенность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "В столице бои, но мы крепко держимся, бунтарям спуску не даем! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} защищает!" {n}В голосе сержанта звучит бравая уверенность.{/n}

languages.text: "There is fighting in the capital, but we're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}holding strong{/d}, giving no quarter to the rebels! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The sergeant's voice is brimming with daring confidence.{/n}

"There is fighting in the capital, but we're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}holding strong{/d}, giving no quarter to the rebels! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The sergeant's voice is brimming with daring confidence.{/n}

languages.text: "In der Hauptstadt wird gekämpft, doch wir {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}halten die Stellung{/d}, schenken den Rebellen keinen Meter! Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} schützt uns!" {n}Die Stimme des Sergeants strotzt nur so vor verwegenem Selbstbewusstsein.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is fighting in the capital, but we're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}holding strong{/d}, giving no quarter to the rebels! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The sergeant's voice is brimming with daring confidence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In der Hauptstadt wird gekämpft, doch wir halten die Stellung, schenken den Rebellen keinen Meter! Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} schützt uns!" {n}Die Stimme des Sergeants strotzt nur so vor verwegenem Selbstbewusstsein.{/n}

languages.text: « Ça bastonne sévère dans la capitale, mais on {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}tient bon{/d} et on met la misère à ces foutus rebelles ! L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} protège ! » {n}Vous sentez la voix du sergent pleine d'assurance et d'audace.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is fighting in the capital, but we're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}holding strong{/d}, giving no quarter to the rebels! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The sergeant's voice is brimming with daring confidence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ça bastonne sévère dans la capitale, mais on tient bon et on met la misère à ces foutus rebelles ! L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}empereur{/g} protège ! » {n}Vous sentez la voix du sergent pleine d'assurance et d'audace.{/n}

languages.text: “首都发生了战斗，但我们会{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}坚守阵地{/d}，毫不留情地打击叛军！愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保佑我们！”{n}军士的声音充满了无畏的自信。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is fighting in the capital, but we're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}holding strong{/d}, giving no quarter to the rebels! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The sergeant's voice is brimming with daring confidence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “首都发生了战斗，但我们会坚守阵地，毫不留情地打击叛军！愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保佑我们！”{n}军士的声音充满了无畏的自信。{/n}

languages.text: 「首都で戦闘が起きていますが、我々は反乱軍に容赦せず、しっかり{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}持ちこたえています{/d}！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}よ、お守りください！」{n}軍曹の声は、向こう見ずな自信に満ちている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is fighting in the capital, but we're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}holding strong{/d}, giving no quarter to the rebels! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The sergeant's voice is brimming with daring confidence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「首都で戦闘が起きていますが、我々は反乱軍に容赦せず、しっかり持ちこたえています！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}よ、お守りください！」{n}軍曹の声は、向こう見ずな自信に満ちている。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Hay combates en la capital, pero {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}resistimos{/d}, sin dar cuartel a los rebeldes! ¡El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} protege!». {n}La voz del sargento rebosa confianza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is fighting in the capital, but we're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}holding strong{/d}, giving no quarter to the rebels! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The sergeant's voice is brimming with daring confidence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Hay combates en la capital, pero resistimos, sin dar cuartel a los rebeldes! ¡El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} protege!». {n}La voz del sargento rebosa confianza.{/n}

languages.text: "Başkentte savaş var ama burası sağlam, isyancılara {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}geçit vermiyoruz{/d}! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korur!" {n}Çavuşun sesi, cüretkâr bir güvenle dolup taşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is fighting in the capital, but we're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}holding strong{/d}, giving no quarter to the rebels! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The sergeant's voice is brimming with daring confidence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Başkentte savaş var ama burası sağlam, isyancılara geçit vermiyoruz! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korur!" {n}Çavuşun sesi, cüretkâr bir güvenle dolup taşıyor.{/n}
